search_results.snippet: The General in His Labyrinth (original Spanish title: El general en su laberinto) is a novel by the Colombian writer and Nobel laureate Gabriel Garca Mrquez. It is a fictionalized account of the last days of Simn Bolvar, liberator and leader of Gran Colombia.
